title: Augmented Reality-Enhanced English Vocabulary Improvement Program for Low-Achieving Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary comprehension and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Provides personalized vocabulary learning environments using mobile augmented reality technology for adult learners who struggle to maintain learning interest.

learning_goals: Learners can contextually utilize over 10 new English vocabulary items per week via a mobile augmented reality application.
Learners achieve a vocabulary recognition accuracy rate of over 80% while interacting with digital content.
Learners demonstrate a 15% or higher improvement in standardized vocabulary assessments after completing the 4-week course.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
